basic.description:
Study of changing approaches to performance internationally from late 19th century to mid-20th century. Emphasis on interdisciplinarity with other arts and experimentation in methods and forms of stage production.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Modernist Staging

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    Level 3 and (registration in a DRAM major or medial Plan, or COCA-CODR Sub-plan or STSC Specialization Plan) and (a GPA of 2.60 in DRAM) or permission of the Department.
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from DRAM300; DRAM310; DRAM318
